arabic_text: وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡأَيۡكَةِ وَقَوۡمُ تُبَّعٖۚ كُلّٞ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
translation: and the dwellers of the Forest[6], and the people of Tubba‘[7]. All of them rejected the messengers, so My warning was fulfilled.
footnotes:
[6] i.e., the people of Shu‘ayb (عليه السلام).
 [7] Tubba‘ al-Himyari, an ancient righteous Yemeni king. See 44:37.
